faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Reach out to our customer support team.

items.question: Which panel shapes are supported?
items.answer: In the MVP you can work with RECT, TRAPEZOID, L_SHAPE, and POLYGON. Each shape has dedicated parameters and automatic bounding box calculation.

items.question: How does CSV export work?
items.answer: We validate dimensions and material assignments before exporting. The CSV includes furniture, group, dimensions in mm, material thickness, and edge data for rectangular panels.

items.question: Is my data safe?
items.answer: Project state stays in the browser (localStorage). Nothing is uploaded to a server, so you can work offline without losing changes.

items.question: Can I control the 3D camera?
items.answer: Yes. OrbitControls and TransformControls let you add and move parts, and a reset button returns the camera to the default view.

items.question: What comes next?
items.answer: Upcoming features include more export formats, advanced edge banding for complex shapes, and ready-made cabinet templates.
